verses.roman:
bhāgavata paḍa, sadā laha kṛṣṇa-nāma
acire karibena kṛpā kṛṣṇa bhagavān"

synonyms: bhāgavata paḍa—read Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; sadā—always; laha kṛṣṇa-nāma—chant the Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra; acire—very soon; karibena—will bestow; kṛpā—mercy; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
translation: "In Vṛndāvana you should chant the Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra twenty-four hours a day and read Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam continuously. Kṛṣṇa, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, will very soon bestow His mercy upon you."
